CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start on Open
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Start the service when the app is launched (and quit app when stopping service).

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Foreground Service
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable a notification while running, and run with more priority (especially in Doze mode).

EditTextPreference.android:title: SSH Server Password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: If blank, a random password will be generated and shown on the console at each login attempt

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Run as root
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: If root access is available, will try to run the ssh server in root mode

EditTextPreference.android:title: SSH Path
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Location of misc dropbear files (put authorized_keys here).
